gift.name: FAR-SIGHTEDNESS
gift.description: The gift frequency of Following, expressing through far-sightedness

siddhi.name: OMNISCIENCE
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Following, expressing through omniscience

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 17 shadow frequency. The opinion you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural far-sightedness. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from opinion to far-sightedness.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your ajna. Notice the sensation of opinion.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 17 consciously for 7 days, the opinion pattern will shift toward far-sightedness.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 17 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from opinion toward far-sightedness
